Bashkir State Medical University, MBBS in Russia 2024-25

Bashkir State Medical University is a higher educational institution that was established in the year 1932. Bashkir State Medical University is one of the oldest leading medical Universities in Russia for MBBS abroad admissions. In fact, Bashkir State Medical University is ranked in the list of the top 10 Russian Medical Universities that provides low cost MBBS tuition fee structure and hassle free admission. This is why, Bashkir State Medical University has clearly become a popular medical college to study MBBS in Russia for Indian students. Here, you will know about the Bashkir State Medical University’s MBBS fee structure, ranking, hostel facilities and the admission procedure along with the syllabus and scope /career options of studying MBBS at Kazan state Medical university.

This university is located in the city of Ufa. Bashkir State Medical University is one of the largest medical research centers in the Ufa, Russian Federation. Ufa is one of the most beautiful and largest important cities in Russia. The very popular MBBS General Medicine course is taught entirely in English medium to the International students. Though there are filly Russian and bilingual courses available as well.

Bashkir State Medical University has been official given the license to train the International students in various MBBS and medical courses by the Ministry of Education of the Russian Federation. Bashkir State Medical University is accredited by the World Health Organization (WHO), General Medical council (GMC), Medical Council of India (MCI) and more.

At present, there are International students from over 30 countries studying at Bashkir State Medical University. And since its inception, there have been 2500 general practitioners, gynecologists, dentists, and pediatricians, who’ve been trained at this university from the foreign countries.

Total Budget of Studying MBBS in Bashkir State Medical University

The total budget of studying MBBS at Bashkir State Medical University, Russia is approximately 33-34 Lakhs. This includes the 6 years of MBBS course tuition fees, hostel charges, Food expenses, living expenses and other charges.

Bashkir State Medical University Faculty and Infrastructure

Bashkir State Medical University has become a leading and topmost university for undergraduate and postgraduate courses. It offers postgraduate courses in 56 scientific majors and doctoral courses in 8 scientific majors. At Bashkir State Medical University, there are 10 doctoral and 3 candidate dissertation councils which awards academic degrees in 23 majors. There are 615 faculty teaching at the Bashkir State Medical University (BSMU) and at present over 8000 Medical Students and over 500 full-time faculty at the school of General Medicine (MBBS), dentistry, Pediatrics, Nursing, Pharmacy, and Preventive Medicine.

Faculty of General Medicine trains specialists in Internal Disease, Surgery, Obstetrics And Gynecology, Psychiatry, Otorhinolaryngology, Dermatology And Venereology, Infectious Diseases, etc. The departments of the faculty are equipped with modern diagnostic facilities. To improve the students’ exposure, several well known and foreign scientists and consultants are invited at the university to deliver lectures and the seminars.

Bashkir State Medical University has a University hospital that has 7 Building and has out-patient clinics for medical and dental, well-equipped laboratories, Bashkir State Medical University has a university hospital, medical and dental outpatient clinics, a large library, sports facilities, five dormitories, a summer camp, and a sanatorium. Over the years the Bashkir State Medical University has trained more than 33,000 medical graduates.

This is why, Bashkir State Medical University is one of the leading medical universities in the Russian Federation. Every year thousands of International students takes admission in this university in different medical courses.

Key features of Bashkir State Medical University

Bashkir State Medical University provides high quality knowledge in MBBS courses and enhances their professional skills.

This university is also known to provide various doctoral courses to the students.

The living expenses and the cost of living is also very affordable and in budget.

The medium of teaching for MBBS course is in English for all International students and even the bilingual course is there.

The departments of medicine have fully equipped laboratories with latest diagnostic facilities.

The Bashkir State Medical University provides students with all kinds of facilities, like modern laboratories, training essentials for clinical practice and trained faculties and staff.

Hostel facilities are also available in the Bashkir State Medical University, which is the university is safe.

There are extra-curricular, sports facility and other facilities for the personal development of the students.

Bashkir State University has also achieved many awards and recognized.

The batch size is smaller and students would have students to teacher in the ratio of 15:1.

The university has good number for clinics and hospital tie ups, which provides good clinical exposure.

Bashkir State Medical University has an international relationship with foreign countries to maintain the international infrastructure.

Both the faculties and students have the chance to participate in the international exchange programs, workshops, seminars etc.

History of Bashkir State Medical University:

In the year 1932, Bashkir State Medical University was established as the Bashkortostan Institute in Ufa city of Russian Federation. In 1933, Bashkir State Medical University introduced the Department of foreign languages, Histology, and military conduct. In 1934, the institute opened the department of Normal Physiology, Path-physiology, Pharmacology, Operative Surgery, Microbiology, Internal Medicine, and General Surgery.

BSMU is surely one of the top institutions in the center of Republic of Bashkortostan. Until 1961, there was only one faculty of General Medicine. Later, in 1970, it introduced the Faculty of Preventive Medicine. In 1976, the Faculty of Dentistry started and the Faculty of Pharmacy in 1981.

Why Choose Bashkir State University?

Bashkir State Medical University helps the students to get not just the MBBS degrees but also the holistic development.

Students get the direct admission in this university and there are no entrance exams.

Over the years and during the MBBS program, the university provides intense research work facility to its students.

Bashkir State Medical University encourages the students to participate in international conferences, exchange programs, seminars and more to get global exposure.

This university has huge library and with the maximum number of books and research papers.

The batch size is small which is why, the students can get direct and individual attention. This is why, the students feel comfortable with the syllabus.

Apart from the MBBS program, there are several postgraduate programs too.

The college has tie up and affiliation with high number of clinics and hospitals that makes the practicals and clinical exposure better during the internship and after the 3rd year.

Bashkir State Medical University also provides the postdoctoral programs for the International students at very affordable and low cost tuition fees.

The hostels, campus and premises are safe with 24by7 CCTV surveillance and security.

Security guards and security personnel are also there to patrol the area.

The cost of living is also in budget and quite a peaceful city to live in.

Bashkir State Medical University MBBS Course Duration

The duration of MBBS course at Bashkir State Medical University is 5.8 year and this includes 1 year of mandatory Internship. The medium of instruction is in English and there are bilingual courses as well.

Bashkir State Medical University: Eligibility Criteria 2023

Bashkir State Medical University follows the direct admission procedure once the student is able to meet the following eligibility criteria:

The candidate must have secured 50% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Biology in 12th standard from a recognized board of education for the general category and for other category, it is 40%.

Students must have qualified the NEET exam.

The candidate must have completed 17 years of age as on 31st December of the following year and the upper age limit is 25 years.

Step By Step Admission Procedure For Bashkir State Medical University 2024

As we always say, it is always really hassle-free and convenient to get admission through a good consultant however if you do not want that you can also seek direct admission in First Moscow State Medical university in Russia.

Step 1: First of all, you need to go to the official website and fill up the admission form along with the required documents scanned copies.

Step 2: After filling out the form and uploading the required document copies the student has to wait for couple of days.

Step 3: Within 2 to 3 days, the student will get a confirmation letter stating that the registration has been successfully done and the admission has been provided.

Step 4: After 7 to 10 days time an invitation letter will be given to the student.

Step 5: Following which the student can pay the tuition fees at the university’s account and then apply for the Visa.

Step 6: Using the invitation letter, payment receipt, birth certificate, other required documents the students can apply for student visa at the embassy of Moscow in India.

If you are going through a consultant, you do not have to do anything like this, you just have to give the scanned copies of your documents to us (Boson Meditech) and we will do everything thing for you, right from filling up the admission letter, getting your confirmation letter, getting the invitation letter and applying the visa for you.

After the student Visa is approved, the student can book the air tickets for Russia and Fly. Once the student reaches the university, there are some formalities that need to be completed. We also help with that and one of our representatives will assist the students till the university as well.

After that the admission is completed and the session will start from first of September, though it depends from University to university.

Bashkir State Medical University: Hostel and Accommodation

There are hostel facilities available for the International students at this university.

Bashkir state medical university provides hostel with safe and secure environment to the students.

There are separate hostel rooms available for boys and girls. The hostel rooms are well furnished and all the basic amenities and facilities are there for comfortable living. But most of the rooms have bunker beds.

Most of the rooms available are on sharing basis, which means that Students can get 2, 3 and 4 seater rooms, though the charges of these rooms can vary. Even the rooms are subjected to availability. The rooms are centrally heated and there are cafeterias, dining hall, reading rooms available. The charges of hostel rooms at Bashkir State Medical University are on budget and very nominal. The hostel premises are fully secured and are always under police security. Kitchens are also available in every block which 10-20 students cans hare and these kitchens are meant for self cooking. There are grocery stores nearby and the students can pick up the raw material at affordable prices for self cooking purpose.

Indian mess is also there where non veg and veg food items are there. There are many cheap and low cost restaurants and cafeteria to have meals.

Scope of MBBS from Bashkir State Medical University

Bashkir State Medical University provides various postgraduate and doctoral degree programs for the students who would like to stay back in Russia to continue their further studies after MBBS.

Once the student graduates from Bashkir State Medical University, they are eligible to apply for the different licensing exams of various countries to practice as a licensed practitioner in the respective country.

The MBBS degree from Bashkir State Medical University is recognized worldwide from the recognizing bodies and organizations like: WHO, UNESCO, GMC, FAIMER, NMC and more.

Thus, the MBBS graduates from Bashkir State Medical University can also choose to go for post graduation courses in United Kingdom, United States of America, Australia, India and other countries.

Bashkir State Medical University is also listed in the World Directory of Medical Schools. Therefore, the students are eligible to apply for USMLE, PLAB, NZREX, AMC, NMC and more.

The student can also come back to India and appear for the NEXT Exam. In India, soon the FMGE or the Foreign Medical Graduate Screening Test will be replaced soon in the coming year by the common National Exit test which is called as NEXT exam.

Why Study MBBS in Russia for Indian students?

Russia is indeed one of the most popular choices for Indian students to pursue MBBS in budget.

Tuition fee in Russian medical universities is quite in budget and suits most of the students.

As compared with the private Indian Medical colleges, the MBBS fees in Russian medical universities are quite in budget and at low cost.

Russian medical universities have good standing amongst the world-class medical education and incorporate good and latest technology in providing education to the students.

Russia is also a part of the European credit transfer system (ECTS) that makes the various Universities and medical colleges of the rest of the Europe easily accessible to the medical graduates of Russian medical universities.

With the excellent education standards, the infrastructure of the Russian universities is quite excellent.

The laboratories are really good and have all the advanced technology and equipments and devices.

Most of the medical universities in Russia have their own hospitals and if not they are also affiliated with different hospitals and clinics with plenty of beds where there is good clinical exposure.

Therefore, doing MBBS from Russia is certainly a good decision that the Indian students can make if they genuinely wants to become good doctors.

The medium of instruction in medical universities in Russia is fully in Russian, bilingual, where in first three years are taught in English and the rest of the three years are taught in Russian and lastly they do have fully English medium MBBS courses as well, where in the student will learn the MBBS course entirely in English.

But yet the language course or the language classes would be there that will help the student to learn the local language so that during the clinical years or right after the third year, when the students start visiting the clinic and hospitals, they you would be able to interact with the local patients in their own language as the local patients are mostly non English speaking.

The medical universities in Russia offer hostel facilities with all the basic amenities and tight security to their students. Which is why, the students can study and stay comfortably in there hostels. And also the hostel cost is not very high but it is in budget.

Cost of living in Russia barring few major metropolitan cities, is quite affordable and in budget. So all those Indian students would like to pursue MBBS in budget from good quality medical colleges and schools can take a look at Russian medical colleges like northern state medical university.

Not just the academic and studies, but the Russian medical universities focuses on the overall development of their students, which is why the universities also encourages the students to take part in various sports activities, drama, theatre, cultural programs and more.

Even the seminars are held and medical conferences are conducted from time to time.

The students are also given a chance to play national and even international level of sports on behalf of the university.

Notable facts about Bashkir State Medical University:

The clinics and hospitals at BSMU are also a centre for clinical research and scientific analysis. The Clinic has over 650 beds. Over 20,000 patients from different parts of Russia get treatment done here annually and over 8,000 surgeries are performed with 3 thousand babies delivered annually.

The skilled and expert surgeons of the Bashkir State Medical University Clinic performs various highly skilled surgeries like liver and pancreas resections, stomach and small intestine reconstructive surgeries, all types of thoracoscopic surgeries, brachytherapy, coronary artery stent surgeries. Various techniques of angiographic studies and manipulations on all types of vessels, bile ducts, liver chemoembolization ingrowths, and uterine arteries embolization in fibromyoma arc involved in medical practice. The Clinic uses techniques of minimally invasive and transplantation surgery.

Bashkir State Medical University International Students:

With 69 departments, with over 8 thousand Russian and foreign students, is proud to have history of educating international students from the UK, the USA, Portugal, Argentina, Australia, Sweden, Greece, Israel, India, Jordan, Iran, Yemen, Cameroon, Cyprus, China, Kuwait, Lebanon, Morocco, Nigeria, Palestine, Syria, Sudan, Tanzania, Tunisia, Sri Lanka, etc. The office of Foreign Students coordinates the training of foreign students in BSMU and is responsible for admission, registration and managing the Preparatory and Russian Language courses. BSMU participate in bilateral exchanges of medical students within the International Federation of Medical Students Association Program.

Bashkir State Medical University cooperates with many foreign universities, clinics, scientific and educational centers of Germany, China, Norway, USA, Great Britain, and other countries. Faculty members and students of BSMU participate in exchange programs, conferences and workshops, perform researches together with our international partners.

About Ufa City

Ufa city is the capital of Bashkortostan Republic and it is one of the biggest cities in Russia. The Ufa city lies along the Belaya (White) River just below its confluence with the Ufa River and is located about 1,340 km southeast of Moscow. The city is one of the largest sports, religious, economic, cultural, and scientific centers of the country. It is an important transport hub of Russia. The population of Ufa is about 12 Lakhs. The climate of the city is cold and temperate. The city of Ufa experiences significant rainfall with precipitation even during the driest month. The temperature in Ufa is 3 °C on average.
